overview: Molecular markers in prostate cancer. Artificial intelligence applied to radiomics and genomics in determining aggressive prostate cancer.
research_interests:
Focus on molecular markers for prostate cancer behavior.

associations: Center for Immunization & Infection Research in Cancer
